projects.name: @ldesign/app
projects.description: LDesign 设计系统演示应用 - 展示完整的组件库和工具集，包含 Vue3、TypeScript、Vite 等现代前端技术栈

packageJson.name: @ldesign/app
packageJson.description: LDesign 设计系统演示应用 - 展示完整的组件库和工具集，包含 Vue3、TypeScript、Vite 等现代前端技术栈

scripts.clean: rimraf esm cjs dist types lib coverage .nyc_output test-results.json junit.xml
scripts.clean:all: rimraf esm cjs dist types lib coverage .nyc_output test-results.json junit.xml node_modules
scripts.ci: pnpm lint:ci && pnpm type-check && pnpm test:ci && pnpm build && pnpm docs:build && pnpm docs:check-links
scripts.ci:test: pnpm lint:check && pnpm type-check && pnpm test:ci
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build && pnpm run test:run

projects.name: @ldesign/color
projects.description: A framework-agnostic theme color management library with Vue 3 integration

packageJson.name: @ldesign/color
packageJson.description: A framework-agnostic theme color management library with Vue 3 integration
packageJson.author: ldesign

scripts.clean: rimraf esm cjs dist types lib coverage .nyc_output .tsbuildinfo node_modules/.cache
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build:prod && pnpm run test:run && pnpm run lint:check
scripts.ci: pnpm run lint:check && pnpm run type-check && pnpm run test:run
scripts.ci:coverage: pnpm run lint:check && pnpm run type-check && pnpm run test:coverage
scripts.release: pnpm run ci:coverage && pnpm run build:prod && changeset publish

projects.name: @ldesign/engine
projects.description: A powerful Vue3 application engine with plugin system, middleware support, and global management

packageJson.name: @ldesign/engine
packageJson.description: A powerful Vue3 application engine with plugin system, middleware support, and global management
packageJson.author: ldesign

scripts.build:check: pnpm run build && pnpm run build:analyze
scripts.test:all: pnpm run test:unit && pnpm run test:integration && pnpm run test:performance && pnpm run test:e2e
scripts.clean: rimraf esm cjs dist types lib coverage .nyc_output
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build && pnpm run test:run
scripts.ci: pnpm run lint:check && pnpm run format:check && pnpm run type-check && pnpm run test:all
scripts.precommit: pnpm run lint && pnpm run format && pnpm run type-check
scripts.quality:check: pnpm run lint:check && pnpm run format:check && pnpm run type-check && pnpm run test:unit
scripts.quality:fix: pnpm run lint && pnpm run format && pnpm run test:unit

scripts.clean: rimraf dist es lib types types-temp coverage .nyc_output temp_vue_files test-build
scripts.ci: pnpm run lint:check && pnpm run type-check && pnpm run test:run
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build && pnpm run ci

projects.name: @ldesign/router
projects.description: A modern, high-performance Vue router library with TypeScript support, independent of vue-router

packageJson.name: @ldesign/router
packageJson.description: A modern, high-performance Vue router library with TypeScript support, independent of vue-router
packageJson.author: ldesign

scripts.clean: rimraf esm cjs dist types lib coverage .nyc_output
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build && pnpm run test:run
scripts.validate: pnpm run type-check && pnpm run test:run && pnpm run build
